CustomField.formula:
IF( RecordTypeId = "0120B000000N8bx", IMAGE("/resource/Student_Icon" ,"", 20, 25) , IF( Tutor_Course_Sections__c >0 , IMAGE("/resource/Tutor_Icon" ,"", 20, 25) , IF( Number_of_books_adopted__c >0 , IMAGE("/resource/Textbook_Icon" ,"OSC Adopter", 20, 30) , IMAGE("/resource/None_Icon" ,"", 25, 25)
)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (Icon indicating level of involvement.) Tutor, Textbook, Student, or None.
CustomField.label: Overview
